content:

title: I think...
content: It's great to have mods arranged chronologically, although it's difficult to ascertain when each one was released.

title: Re: PlanetCK Mods Section
content:
New to old is best, because otherwise you have to scroll all the way to the end to see the latest additions - and if you have multiple pages that's really going to be a hassle (and the oldest, dodgiest mod will always have a front row seat...)

Like Xky says, make it obvious how old each mod is, and don't forget to highlight ones that have new versions released. It'd also be nice to have an indicator telling us how much of the game was actually modded - just a few levels, or all levels, all graphics, and most sounds, etc.
